mapper.update: UPDATE polla_bets SET local_bet_score = #{localBetScore}, visitor_bet_score = #{visitorBetScore}, updated_date = now(), status = #{status}, result_bet = #{resultBet}, flg_wildcard = #{flagWildcard} WHERE id = #{idBet}
mapper.select: select pb.id as polla_bet_id, pb.polla_match_id as polla_bet_match_id, pb.polla_participant_id as polla_bet_participant_id, pb.local_bet_score as polla_bet_local_score, pb.visitor_bet_score as polla_bet_visitor_score, pb.result_bet as polla_bet_result, pb.updated_date as polla_bet_updated_date, pb.points as polla_bet_points, pb.status as polla_bet_status,pb.flg_wildcard, pm.id as polla_match_id, pm.polla_header_id as polla_match_header_id, pm.match_id as polla_match_match_id, m.id as match_id, m.match_code, m.match_date , m.match_place, m.result_match, m.local_score, m.visitor_score, m.status, m.local_team_id, tl.team_name as local_team_name, tl.image as image_local, m.visitor_team_id, tv.team_name as visitor_team_name, tv.image as image_visitor from polla_bets as pb, polla_matches as pm, matchs as m, teams as tl, teams as tv where pb.polla_match_id = pm.id and pm.match_id = m.id and m.local_team_id = tl.id and m.visitor_team_id = tv.id and polla_participant_id = #{pollaParticipantId};
